segment.source: Export a GPO to a File
segment.target: Export a GPO to a File

segment.source: Export a GPO to a File
segment.target: Export a GPO to a File

segment.source: Export a GPO to a File
segment.target: Export a GPO to a File

segment.source: You can export a controlled Group Policy Object (GPO) to a CAB file so that you can copy it to a domain in another forest and import the GPO into Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) in that domain.
segment.target: You can export a controlled Group Policy Object (GPO) to a CAB file so that you can copy it to a domain in another forest and import the GPO into Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) in that domain.

segment.source: For information about how to import GPO settings into a new or existing GPO, see Import a GPO from a File.
segment.target: For information about how to import GPO settings into a new or existing GPO, see Import a GPO from a File.

segment.source: A user account with the Editor or AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: A user account with the Editor or AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.
segment.target: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.

segment.source: To export a GPO to a file
segment.target: To export a GPO to a file

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.

segment.source: On the Contents tab, click the Controlled tab to display the controlled GPOs.
segment.target: On the Contents tab, click the Controlled tab to display the controlled GPOs.

segment.source: Right-click the GPO, and then click Export to.
segment.target: Right-click the GPO, and then click Export to.

segment.source: Enter a file name for the file to which you want to export the GPO, and then click Export.
segment.target: Enter a file name for the file to which you want to export the GPO, and then click Export.

segment.source: If the file does not exist, it is created.
segment.target: If the file does not exist, it is created.

segment.source: If it already exists, it is replaced.
segment.target: If it already exists, it is replaced.

segment.source: By default, you must be an Editor or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) to perform this procedure.
segment.target: By default, you must be an Editor or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) to perform this procedure.

segment.source: Specifically, you must have List Contents, Read Settings, and Export GPO permissions for the GPO.
segment.target: Specifically, you must have List Contents, Read Settings, and Export GPO permissions for the GPO.
